trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Net.WebClient.UploadProgressChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Net.WebClient.UploadProgressChanged" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" />.

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: As instâncias dessa classe são passadas para o <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de bytes recebidos.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> valor que indica o número de bytes recebidos.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Carregar dados em um servidor pode resultar em um download do servidor.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que seu aplicativo carrega uma solicitação POST em um servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: The resulting download will update <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> and <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O download resultante será atualizado <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> e <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a porcentagem da transferência ocorreu, use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When the upload is complete, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 50%.
trans-unit.target: Quando o carregamento for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 50%.

trans-unit.source: When the download completes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 100%.
trans-unit.target: Quando o download for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 100%.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de bytes enviados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> valor que indica o número de bytes enviados.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Carregar dados em um servidor pode resultar em um download do servidor.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que seu aplicativo carrega uma solicitação POST em um servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: The resulting download will update <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> and <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O download resultante será atualizado <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> e <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a porcentagem da transferência ocorreu, use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When the upload is complete, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 50%.
trans-unit.target: Quando o carregamento for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 50%.

trans-unit.source: When the download completes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 100%.
trans-unit.target: Quando o download for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 100%.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" /> data upload operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de bytes em uma operação de upload de dados <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes that will be received.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> valor que indica o número de bytes que serão recebidos.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of bytes already received, use the <xref:System.Net.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o número de bytes recebidos já, use o <xref:System.Net.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Carregar dados em um servidor pode resultar em um download do servidor.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que seu aplicativo carrega uma solicitação POST em um servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: The resulting download will update <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> and <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O download resultante será atualizado <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> e <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a porcentagem da transferência ocorreu, use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When the upload is complete, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 50%.
trans-unit.target: Quando o carregamento for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 50%.

trans-unit.source: When the download completes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 100%.
trans-unit.target: Quando o download for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 100%.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes to send.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de bytes a enviar.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes that will be sent.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> valor que indica o número de bytes que será enviada.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of bytes already sent, use the <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesSent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o número de bytes já enviadas, use o <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesSent%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Carregar dados em um servidor pode resultar em um download do servidor.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: When the upload is complete, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 50%.
trans-unit.target: Quando o carregamento for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 50%.

trans-unit.target: Quando o download for concluído, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> será 100%.
